hotels.title: Five-Star Piedmont Countryside Retreat near UNESCO World Heritage-Listed Langhe
hotels.description: Positioned in the foothills of the mighty Alps, at the convergence of three of Piedmont’s celebrated wine-making regions, the the five-star Casa di Langa is your gateway to the vine-clad hills, historic castles and oak forests of UNESCO World Heritage-listed Langhe. Meander through 42 flawlessly maintained acres, study up at the hotel’s wine academy and cooking school, unwind at Lelòse Spa & Wellness or savour the region’s iconic cornucopia of wine, hazelnuts and truffles at farm-to-table revelation Fàula Ristorante.
